intro: Biondia microcentra, commonly known as the small-centred biondia, is a species of flowering plant native to the Caribbean islands. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and woody stems. It typically grows in moist, shaded habitats within tropical forests. Biondia microcentra is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
